ðŸ“– Summary: doWM is a window manager for X11, written in Go, that provides both floating and tiling window management capabilities. It is configured using YAML files and shell scripts, allowing users to customize their window management experience. The primary goal is to provide a simple and beautiful window management solution for Linux users.
